Salesforce Utils for Admins and Developers 
Features :
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. SOQL Query Console with support for Tooling API
2. REST Console for making REST API calls to Salesforce in one click
3. SOAP Console to support Salesforce SOAP API  to provide retrieve and deploy  functions
4. Data visualization to support visualizing Salesforce Query Results
5. ERD generator
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Coming soon:
1. Sharing Debugger
2. CRMA Tools
3. Data Visualization  Tools
